availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: E. Z. Smith (Lyon County, Ky, resident)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, resident. Signed a petition to Thomas E. Bramlette on behalf of the estate of Theophilus Cooksey in Lyon County, Kentucky, on August 17, 1863. Signed a petition to Thomas E. Bramlette on behalf of the estate of Elias Smith in Lyon County, Kentucky, on September 19, 1863. Signed a petition to Thomas E. Bramlette on behalf of Charles Braswell and N. T. Braswell in Lyon County, Kentucky, in December 1863.

ab.bibl:
